thread.title: Redcar steelworks SSI UK goes into liquidation
thread.title_full: Redcar steelworks SSI UK goes into liquidation

author: Mehreen Khan
title: Redcar steelworks SSI UK goes into liquidation
text: Industry Redcar steelworks SSI UK goes into liquidation Sacked employees at mothballed plant will be given training and new job opportunities in £80m government support package The Government has announced an £80 million package to support workers who have lost their jobs at the plant
